bug.author: ramsane
bug.summary: Cannot Export as dataset: AttributeError: 'ProjectDataset' object has no attribute 'export'\n"
bug.description:
Error: Request failed with status code 500. "AttributeError: 'ProjectDataset' object has no attribute 'export'\n". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14745146/72803053-23ef1c80-3c73-11ea-830f-61222076faa9.png></denchmark-link>
On clicking any of the options, it is giving that error. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14745146/72803106-44b77200-3c73-11ea-9e13-d710253ee1d0.png></denchmark-link>
Any one has any idea on why this is hapenning
